{"id":615218664,"lang":"cpp","time":"7 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1641601762,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/615218664/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Word Abbreviation","memory":"5.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool validWordAbbreviation(string word, string abbr) {\n        int w = 0 ;\n        int a = 0 ;\n        while(w < word.size() && a < abbr.size()){\n            if(abbr[a] == '0'){\n                return false;\n            }\n            int num =0 ;\n            while(a < abbr.size() && isdigit(abbr[a])){\n                num = num*10 + (abbr[a]-'0');\n                a++;\n            }\n            if(num!=0){\n                w = w+ num ;\n            }else{\n                if(word[w]!= abbr[a]){\n                    return false;\n                }\n                a++;\n                w++;\n            }\n            \n        }\n        return  a == abbr.size() && w == word.size();\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-word-abbreviation"}
